channel.title: Welcome on PT-symmetric electronic structure theory
channel.description: Recent content in Welcome on PT-symmetric electronic structure theory

item.title: People
item.author: loos@irsamc.ups-tlse.fr (Titou Loos)
item.description: People funded by the ERC Pierre-François Loos CNRS Researcher (Laboratoire de Chimie et Physique Quantiques, Toulouse, France) P.-F. Loos received his Ph.D. in Computational and Theoretical Chemistry from the Université Henri Poincaré (Nancy, France) in 2008. From 2009 to 2013, He was undertaking postdoctoral research with Peter M.W. Gill at the Australian National University (ANU). From 2013 to 2017, he was a “Discovery Early Career Researcher Award” recipient and, then, a senior lecturer at the ANU.

item.title: Publications
item.author: loos@irsamc.ups-tlse.fr (Titou Loos)
item.description: window.onload = async function () { /* Get list of publication */ pub = await fetch('https://api.archives-ouvertes.fr/search/?q=europeanProject_t:pterosor&indent=true&fl=citationRef_s,arxivId_s,files_s,title_s,abstract_s,author_s,authFullName_s,journal_s,label_bibtex,doiId_s,publicationDateY_i,publicationDate_tdate&group=false&start=0&rows=10000&fq=docType_s:(ART+OR+COMM+OR+OUV+OR+COUV+OR+DOUV+OR+OTHER+OR+UNDEFINED+OR+REPORT+OR+THESE+OR+HDR)&sort=publicationDate_tdate%20desc').then(function (response) { return response.json(); }).then(function (response) { return response.response.docs; }); /* Display list of publications */ listContainer = document.createElement('div'), listElement = document.createElement('ul'), document.getElementsByTagName('article')[0].appendChild(listContainer); listContainer.appendChild(listElement); for (i in pub) { title = pub[i].title_s; arxivId = pub[i].arxivId_s; citationRef = pub[i].citationRef_s; try { url = pub[i].files_s[0]; } catch (error) { url = "" }; authors = pub[i].

item.title: Software
item.author: loos@irsamc.ups-tlse.fr (Titou Loos)
item.description: window.onload = async function () { /* Get list of repositories */ var proxyUrl = 'https://cors-anywhere.herokuapp.com/'; var targetUrl = 'https://git.irsamc.ups-tlse.fr/api/v1/orgs/pterosor/repos'; software = await fetch(proxyUrl + targetUrl).then(function (response) { return response.json(); }).then(function (response) { return response; }); /* Display list of repositories */ listContainer = document.createElement('div'), listElement = document.createElement('ul'), document.getElementsByTagName('article')[0].appendChild(listContainer); listContainer.appendChild(listElement); for (repo in software) { if (software[repo].mirror) { name = software[repo].full_name.split('/')[1]; description = software[repo].description; url = software[repo].website; if (url == "
